metadata.title: CVE-2024-8443 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability was found in the libopenscOpenPGP driver. A crafted USB device or smart card with malicious responsesto the APDUs during the card enrollment process using the `pkcs15-init`tool may lead to out-of-bound rights, possibly resulting in arbitrary codeexecution.

criterions.comment: opensc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
